quote: The golden opportunity you are seeking is in yourself. It is not in your environment; it is not in luck or chance, or the help of others; it is in yourself alone.  – Orison Swett Marden
fact: The most common street name in the U.S. is Second Street.
joke: It's difficult to say what my wife does, she sells sea shells by the sea shore.
